rationale: The intensifier 'clearly' modifies 'an animal exposure' (noun phrase), not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: There was some question as to whether or not there was also contact with birds on the same farm. There was some question as to whether or not there was also contact with birds on the same farm. So either way, it [the source of exposure]’s clearly an animal exposure.
